entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
